title: What are the best stocks to buy for 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nutanix (NTNX) This is one killer stock that would highly recommend you to buy in 2019. If you are not aware, Nutanix is known for selling hyper converged appliances and software designed storage. as per the track record and rating, Baird’s Jonathan Rukhaver has said that the company appears to be market leader with an expected growth opportunity of 25 percent in the upcoming years. In of the articles, Ruykhaver has also mentioned that the company is viewed as a though leader and the market leader in hybrid cloud management. This company has the potential to change into a software only business model Amazon (AMZN) You must be aware of the fact that Amazon is an e-commerce giant. Let me also tell you that being one of the biggest companies of the world, its stock market potential is still unmatchable. Amazon has recently reported a consistent revenue growth, given a rate of 23 percent with every year. This has been stronger than expected especially for its AWS cloud unit. Revance Therapeutics (RVNC) Revence Therapeutics is expected to outperform this year. Currently, the company is working on it product candidate RT002. This is a frown-freezing injectable set which is likely to give tough compete with Xeomin and Botox Let me tell you that RT-002 has the capability to turn into the first ever long lasting injectable creation of botulinum toxin type. You will be surprised to know that the use of botulinum for therapeutic and aesthetic demonstrates a market of $3.4 globally Dropbox (DBX) Another noteworthy company that you must consider for investment purpose is the DropBox. Even though, this company cannot be compared with the biggest giants like Microsoft and Alphabet as they offer free storage via G-suit and Microsoft 365. But, the company believes that it can give valuable third party services, and G-suite and Microsoft are not two of its biggest partners As per an analyst, the company’s premium model allows for an effective customer acquisition, high levels of customer retention and considerable revenue with a number of upsell opportunities. The company has also acquired HelloSign for $230 million. This major acquisition has provided DBX with an opportunity to diversify further and win more shares for the customers. Salesforce (CRM) Another company where you can choose to invest is the Salesforce.com: The Customer Success Platform To Grow Your Business. This company is a market-share leader for sure. The company sure consists of revolutionary products and a strong business culture, led under the super vision of a visionary CEO. Its most recent update is the Einstein Visual Search which enables users to take a picture on their mobile phones and then search for similar products. Other than this, its business fundamentals are strong and would even get better if its adoption of SaaS and data analytics increases Given a $180 price target, analysts have selected CRM as no 1 company for investment in 2019 .
